summary: This is a declaration by a custodian of records certifying the authenticity of FedEx Express invoices from October 2002 billed to Jeffrey Epstein's New York address. The document is part of records provided to law enforcement for an investigation by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The FedEx Express invoices are billed to Jeffrey Epstein at his Madison Avenue address in New York.

events.title: FedEx invoice billing to Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: FedEx Express invoice numbered 4-397-85573 was billed to Jeffrey Epstein at his New York address.

locations.description: Jeffrey Epstein's New York address where FedEx invoices were billed
Jurisdiction of the U.S. Attorney's Office conducting the investigation

keyFacts: A custodian of records certified FedEx Express invoices from October 2002 billed to Jeffrey Epstein as authentic business records.
The records were provided to law enforcement for an investigation by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document establishes a paper trail connecting Jeffrey Epstein to financial transactions at his New York address in 2002.
